Articles.Content:
It\'s call desert operation.

It\'s a very cool game, you are a president of a country and you must build flats, houses and those tings to get money, with money you can investegation troops like tanks, airbombers and those thing. If you have inestegation one kind of troop you can build it a attack other countrys. You also have things like allies. It\'s a very big browsergame with reeal time war in it! Bij registration you have almost 20 languases to choose so that you don\'t have to sit with poeple that live on the other side on the world.

Just try it!

[http://game.desert-operations.nl/?recruiter=4329&world=d29ybGQy](http://game.desert-operations.nl/?recruiter=4329&world=d29ybGQy)
Played that a long time. Does the oil crysis balancing failure still exist?

> 
> Played that a long time. Does the oil crysis balancing failure still exist?

No, but why did you stopped DO?

Got boring after a year, just building skyscrapers every 3 months and sometimes pwning an inactive luser.

Also, only research left was that mining thing which also took a long time to complete.

Maybe it was just the german server...
